original_title: Swiss Ceylon Associates expands in SL and South East Asia
original_body_lines: Swiss Ceylon Associates’ main activities in Sri Lanka are in the field of raw materials from Luzi – a Swiss company with manufacturing facilities in several countries – under its slogan “CREATIVITY, COMPETENCE AND QUALITY”. Luzi specializes in the development of unique scents for fine fragrances, personal care, home and air care. LUZI scents are carefully created to contribute to the success of its clients’ products, always considering the latest trends and innovations.

“Being fully aware of the difficulties many companies are facing in this moment, we are providing solutions for the local industries to enhance their products. We are confident that Sri Lanka will emerge strong again, the SCA management said in a statement.

A press release adds: ‘Swiss Eyewear Group with key brands INVU and SMARTY spectacles and sunglasses has entrusted several markets in Asia to Swiss Ceylon and 2022 saw a nett growth of 43 %. Swiss Eyewear Group is a Swiss company and one of the fastest growing group in the eyewear market.
‘With further activities in the pipeline, the company will be expanding its presence in the near future to several countries in South East Asia.

‘Swiss Ceylon recognises the importance of its collaborators as its main asset and has further strengthened its team under the leadership of the well-known businessman Vernon Manilal Fernando as chairman. The main collaborators are Dr. Manil Fernando, Malik Fernando, Thomas Daetwyler, Nawziya Hossen, Deshani Liyanage, Mahendra Gunewardene, Suresh Herath and M.N. Imran.’
